ValidationRule.description: All Non Standard deals should not be allowed past Solution Design without a quote record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Standard Deal")), CASE( StageName, "Id. Decision Makers", 1, "Revenue Validation", 1, "Negotiation", 1, "Proposal Review", 1, "Proposal Acceptance", 1, "Signed Contract", 1, "Billed", 1, 0) = 1, NOT(QuoteAttached__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All Non Standard deals should not be allowed past Solution Design without a quote record
